txt_en: I have decided to stick with love. Hate is too great a burden to bear.
txt_cn: 我决定持守友爱，因为仇恨实在令人不堪重负。
author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

txt_en: Keep your face to the sunshine and you cannot see a shadow.
txt_cn: 一直面向阳光，你就不会看到阴暗。
author: Helen Keller

txt_en: Integrity is doing the right thing, even when no one is watching.
txt_cn: 诚实是在没人知道的时候也坚持做对的事情。
author: C. S. Lewis

txt_en: Diligence is the mother of good luck.
txt_cn: 勤奋孕育好运。
author: Benjamin Franklin

txt_en: There is only one happiness in this life, to love and be loved.
txt_cn: 人生只有一种幸福，爱人并且被人爱。
author: George Sand

txt_en: Good habits formed at youth make all the difference.
txt_cn: 年轻时养成的良好习惯使人受益终身。
author: Aristotle

txt_en: A room without books is like a body without a soul.
txt_cn: 居无书，犹如人无魂。
author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

txt_en: I attribute my success to this: I never gave or took any excuse.
txt_cn: 我将自己的成功归结为：我从来不找借口，也从来不接受借口。
author: Florence Nightingale

txt_en: Every child is an artist. The problem is how to remain an artist once he grows up.
txt_cn: 每个孩子都是艺术家，难就难在长大之后还是艺术家。
author: Pablo Picasso

txt_en: Life is too short to waste your time on people who don't respect, appreciate, and value you.
txt_cn: 人生太短，不要浪费在不尊重、不欣赏、也不珍惜你的人身上。
author: Roy T. Bennett

txt_en: Self-confidence is the first requisite to great undertakings.
txt_cn: 自信是成大事的首要条件。
author: Samuel Johnson

txt_en: Instead of worrying about what you cannot control, shift your energy to what you can create.
txt_cn: 与其担心你无法掌控的，不如将精力花在你能创造的东西上。
author: Roy T. Bennett

txt_en: It's kind of fun to do the impossible.
txt_cn: 做不可能的事还挺有趣的。
author: Walt Disney

txt_en: Intelligence without ambition is a bird without wings.
txt_cn: 聪明但没有抱负，有如没有翅膀的鸟。
author: Salvador Dali

txt_en: Never, never, never give up.
txt_cn: 不，绝不，永不放弃。
author: Winston Churchill

txt_en: If you love life, don't waste time, for time is what life is made up of.
txt_cn: 如果你热爱生活，就别浪费时间，因为生活是时间组成的。
author: Bruce Lee

txt_en: I am always ready to learn although I do not always like being taught.
txt_cn: 虽然我并不喜欢有人教我，但我一直乐于学习。
author: Winston Churchill

txt_en: Autumn leaves don’t fall; they fly. They take their time and wander on this, their only chance to soar.
txt_cn: 秋叶并不会坠落，它们会飞翔。它们尽情享受着这唯一一次肆意盘旋的机会。
author: Delia Owens

txt_en: It does not do well to dwell on dreams and forget to live, remember that.
txt_cn: 记住，不要依赖梦想而忘记生活。
author: J.K. Rowling

txt_en: I argue thee that love is life. And life hath immortality.
txt_cn: 我告诉你，爱就是生命，生命可以不朽。
author: Emily Dickinson

txt_en: You can overcome anything, if and only if you love something enough.
txt_cn: 只要也只有你足够热爱某件事，就可以克服任何困难。
author: Lionel Messi

txt_en: What seems to us as bitter trials are often blessings in disguise.
txt_cn: 我们看起来似乎痛苦的试炼，常常是伪装起来的好运。
author: Oscar Wilde

txt_en: If you judge people, you have no time to love them.
txt_cn: 如果你论断人，就没有时间去爱他们了。
author: Mother Teresa

txt_en: Character—the willingness to accept responsibility for one's own life—is the source from which self-respect springs.
txt_cn: 人格力量就是愿意为自己的生活承担责任的决心，这正是自尊的来源。
author: Joan Didion

txt_en: It is said the feeling called happiness cannot be known alone.
txt_cn: 听说，有种叫幸福的感觉无法独享。
author: Aleskei Arbusov

txt_en: Nothing behind me, everything ahead of me, as is ever so on the road.
txt_cn: 抛开顾虑，探索未知，永远在路上。
author: Jack Kerouac
